info.name: minor character.ai tweaks
info.description:
Non-intrusive tweaks to character.ai styles. 
Colors: Italics, bolds, bold-italic.
Hides: "c.ai" tag next to bot names in chat, "Edited" tag on messages edited by user

Note that all of these are client-side changes. It doesn't change how other users view your bot or messages you share.
